scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener contracts/PHCFToken.sol > flatten-contracts/PHCFToken.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/PHCFReferral.sol > flatten-contracts/PHCFReferral.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/PHCFMasterChef.sol > flatten-contracts/PHCFMasterChef.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/PHCFLottery.sol > flatten-contracts/PHCFLottery.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/Timelock.sol > flatten-contracts/Timelock.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/Multicall.sol > flatten-contracts/Multicall.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SmartChef.sol > flatten-contracts/SmartChef.sol && node flatten_fix.js
scripts.flatten-owner: truffle-flattener contracts/PHCFinanceFactory.sol > flatten-contracts/PHCFinanceFactory.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/PHCFinanceRouter.sol > flatten-contracts/PHCFinanceRouter.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/PHCFinanceProfile.sol > flatten-contracts/PHCFinanceProfile.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/PHCFinancePair.sol > flatten-contracts/PHCFinancePair.sol && node flatten_fix.js
